name: mgn_bootstrap
description: mgnでbootstrapをやるときはこれをつかうよ！

scripts.css-compile: node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-globbing/index.js --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/style.scss dist/css/style.css
scripts.serve: browser-sync start --server --baseDir dist/ --serveStatic dist/ --files 'dist/css/*.css, dist/scripts/*.js, dist/*.html'
scripts.watch: npm run serve & watch 'npm run css-compile & npm run compile-pug' ./src
